name: Lint Fuzzy to Dust Bunny
description:
Lint Fuzzy does not want to live out the rest of his time as dryer lint, he dreams to be a Dust Bunny and live in Couch Cradle.  But getting there won't be as easy as Lint Fuzzy thinks. The items in this house do not like to get dirty. 

Don’t touch the carpet or meet an untimely end.  Bounce your way from table to pillow and cushion trying to get to the couch. But move quickly, the furniture only let you stay on them so long before disappearing to get clean.  Also beware of Vince the Vacuum and Franny Fans.  Don’t run into them or face ruin.  Try not to get vacuumed up or get blown away and meet your end on the carpeted floor!

Solo Project: Jocelyn Brown (Game Dev)

Game Design: Jocelyn Brown

All Audio Assets Recorded and Created by: Jocelyn Brown

3D Modeling/Art: Jocelyn Brown

Version 1.2:  Full Game Playable

Pending Original Upload for: 2022 GDEX Game Jam (Theme: "Erase")
